headerDisplay: The **Thermostat** plugin allows you to control Thermostat Devices. To get started link your Thermostat account. 1. Download Thermostat App on App Store or Google Play Store. 2. Register a Thermostat account and log in into your account. 3. Input your `Email` and `Password` into the parameters below.
footerDisplay:
Please raise any issues on our [project page](https://github.com/chazepps/homebridge-Thermostat/issues).

If you would like to have other Thermostat Devices added to this plugin fill out [Feature Request Form](https://github.com/chazepps/homebridge-Thermostat/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=feature-request.md).

[Thermostat Website](https://hej.life/)
